nodes.text: Mandalore the Indomitable's Basilisk war droid

This customized Basilisk war droid was the personal war mount of Mandalore the Indomitable. Mandalore's Basilisk war droid was a customized version of the regular model, and it was customized specifically to his requirements and specifications. Mandalore the Indomitable is known to have had used it throughout the Great Sith War, such as during the Duel on Kuar and the Battle of Onderon. It was eventually destroyed during battle shortly before the death of Mandalore the Indomitable.
